name: Roasted Baby Mangoes with Vanilla Ice Cream
recipeIngredient: 4 baby mangoes, halved, pitted and peeled

recipeInstructions.text: In a heatproof dish sprayed with vegetable spray, place the mangoes, rounded side up. Brush with the butter and sprinkle with Turbinado sugar. Bake 20 minutes. Turn on the broiler. Broil the mango halves until they begin to brown, about 3-5 minutes. Do not walk away from broiler.
Place a scoop of ice cream (or two) into a glass and add roasted mango halves. Sprinkle with chopped Georgia pecans.
